Tell us where your story begins by entering the @Powerade  # JustAKidSweepstakes for a chance to win tickets to upcoming Stars home games and a road trip to watch the Stars take on the Ducks in Anaheim on April 3, 2016. 
To enter, post a photo showing your dedication to the Stars using the#JustAKidSweepstakes hashtag. Make sure to include where you re from in the caption. A winner for tickets to an upcoming game will be selected on January 1. More information at www.DallasStars.com/justakid

caption:
Tonight's game between the Dallas Stars and Columbus Blue Jackets has been postponed. A decision about the remainder of the game will be made at a later date by the National Hockey League.

Rich Peverley collapsed on the bench. He was tended to by medical personnel immediately and was conscious upon being transferred to a local hospital for further evaluation.

Peverley is doing well and is in stable condition. We will make updates available on Rich Peverley's condition as they become available.

Peverley is doing well and is in stable condition. We will make updates available on Rich Peverley's condition as they become available.

caption: Our friends, Mark Cuban and the Dallas Mavericks honored Mike Modano tonight during halftime and presented him with a gift!
caption_raw: Our friends, Mark Cuban and the Dallas Mavericks honored Mike Modano tonight during halftime and presented him with a gift!

caption:
One more surprise from the #retiring9 weekend! The Dallas Stars announce The Mike Modano Trophy!

The trophy will be presented annually to the Stars regular season leader in points. It stands 5-foot-1 from the bottom of the walnut base to the tip and weighs approximately 140-pounds.

It also features a bronze plate with all 11 seasons Modano captured the point-scoring title for the Stars, another four brass plates on the back with the names of every Stars player in franchise history who finished with the most points prior to Modano and individual name plates of the trophy winners during and since Modano's storied career with the Stars.
caption_raw:
One more surprise from the #retiring9 weekend! The Dallas Stars announce The Mike Modano Trophy!

The trophy will be presented annually to the Stars regular season leader in points. It stands 5-foot-1 from the bottom of the walnut base to the tip and weighs approximately 140-pounds.

It also features a bronze plate with all 11 seasons Modano captured the point-scoring title for the Stars, another four brass plates on the back with the names of every Stars player in franchise history who finished with the most points prior to Modano and individual name plates of the trophy winners during and since Modano's storied career with the Stars.

First period is in the books! Stars lead the Leafs, 2-1, thanks to goals from Cody Eakin and Jamie Benn---His 100th career goal.

With his 100th goal, Benn becomes the 1st player in Dallas Stars history to accomplish feat before age 25. He's the only player in team history to net 100 career PTS before age 23 & last season became youngest player to earn 100th assist.

#GoStars

caption:
The June 4th unveiling event may be "by invite only", but that doesn't mean a few lucky fans can't make their way in! 
We've spread 5 pairs of tickets across Dallas, Lewisville, Fort Worth, and Plano. First fans to find and ask for tickets to the A New Star is Rising event after reading the clues below, win them...simple as that. Once you have them in hand, snap a pic, post it here, and make plans to join us on Tuesday at the AT&T Performing Arts Center ! Here are the clues to help you find the tickets in each city:
1st pair in Uptown Dallas: This restaurant is the official post game destination of Dallas Stars fans and is known for their delicious pizza, drinks, and Rat Pack Wednesdays. Tix will be with the host/hostess. 
2nd pair in Downtown Dallas: These tickets will be with the host/hostess a restaurant that "rocks" pretty "hard". We had a couple of watch parties there as well as the Dallas Stars Ice Girls calendar release party last season. 
3rd Pair in Downtown Fort Worth: These can be found inside the city's "largest and most authentic" downtown hotel that's adjacent to the convention center. The first letter in the name is "O". Tix will be at the concierge desk. 
4th pair in Lewisville (Near I-35 & Hwy 121): These tickets can be found inside a restaurant known for its flair, red&white color scheme, and "day of the week" name. The tix will be with the host/hostess. 
5th pair in Plano: These tickets are in the same "day of the week", red & white restaurant, but on the East side of this city where a couple of watch parties were held last season. Tix will be with the host/hostess. 
Good luck and don't forget to post your picture if you find them!

caption:
The Dallas Stars learned last night that the franchise's first general manager and head coach, Wren Blair, passed away at the age of 87. 
Blair coached the Minnesota North Stars in two stints from 1967-1970 and was the team's general manager until 1974. He was instrumental in building the Stars in those early years, and put together a team that included franchise legends like Cesare Maniago, Bill Goldsworthy, Bill Masterton, Lou Nanne, J.P. Parise, and Gump Worsley.

We are sad to learn of his passing, and extend our deepest sympathies to his family
caption_raw:
The Dallas Stars learned last night that the franchise's first general manager and head coach, Wren Blair, passed away at the age of 87. 
Blair coached the Minnesota North Stars in two stints from 1967-1970 and was the team's general manager until 1974. He was instrumental in building the Stars in those early years, and put together a team that included franchise legends like Cesare Maniago, Bill Goldsworthy, Bill Masterton, Lou Nanne, J.P. Parise, and Gump Worsley.

We are sad to learn of his passing, and extend our deepest sympathies to his family
